creator: Seiko Epson Corporation
descriptionHtml:
Epson Cloud Solution for mobile allow you to grasp the state of the printers in the production site on the smart phone or tablet anytime, anywhere by connecting secure cloud-based platform.
You can see the number of printed jobs, printed area, printer operation rate and also know if there is an error in real time. And 'Report' feature can summarize these data for a specified time period and display graphically and you can also see the breakdown by each printer.
Easy to share the screen-shot which the app is showing with other person by using E-Mail or other sharing application on smart device.
Even if there are some trouble in product site when you're on the go, if it's easy to see whether there are some trouble or not and to resolve quickly, then it's possible to minimize the occurrence of a down time.

In order to login Epson Cloud Solution PORT for mobile, register a user on Epson Cloud Solution PORT (for PC).
descriptionShort: You can use Epson Cloud Solution PORT by the smart devices.

appDetails.developerAddress: 長野県塩尻市広丘原新田８０
